text: Gavin Hoover (born July 12, 1997) is an American racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Continental team . He rode in the men's team pursuit event at the 2018 and the 2019 UCI Track Cycling World Championships.Start list ==Major results== ;2014 : 10th Paris–Roubaix Juniors ;2017 : National Track Championships ::1st 20px Team pursuit (with Adrian Hegyvary, Daniel Holloway & Daniel Summerhill) ::3rd Individual pursuit : 3rd Team pursuit, 2017–18 UCI Track Cycling World Cup, Santiago ;2018 : Pan American Track Championships ::1st 15px Team pursuit (with Ashton Lambie, Colby Lange & Eric Young) ::2nd 15px Individual pursuit : National Track Championships ::1st 20px Team pursuit (with Adrian Hegyvary, Ashton Lambie & Shane Kline) ::3rd Individual pursuit ;2019 : Pan American Games ::1st 15px Team pursuit (with Ashton Lambie, John Croom & Adrian Hegyvary) ::2nd 15px Madison : 1st 20px Omnium, National Track Championships : 3rd 15px Omnium, Pan American Track Championships ;2020 : 3rd Omnium, 2019–20 UCI Track Cycling World Cup, Milton ==References== ==External links== * *Team USA profile Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:American male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from New York City Category:Cyclists at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games medalists in cycling Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for the United States Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for the United States
title: Gavin Hoover
